quest.name: And Then a Hero Comes Along
journal:
 Quest Sync
The state of affairs in this corner of the world has left many sick and hungry, Amanieu and his daughter not least among them.
objectives: Obtain the buckwheat seeds from a container in the marketplace.
Deliver the buckwheat seeds to Amanieu.

dialogue.name: AMANIEU
dialogue.text: A moment, good ladysir, if you've one to spare. My daughter has taken ill with a menace of a cold. She can hardly keep even a bite of food down, though I know that a simple bowl of kasha will be easy on the stomach, and be enough to sustain her.

dialogue.name: AMANIEU
dialogue.text: Unfortunately, I lack the buckwheat seeds the recipe calls for. The abandoned market ought to have what I require, but...I do not fancy my chances in a place so dangerous.

dialogue.name: AMANIEU
dialogue.text: Besides, I dare not leave my girl alone for an extended period. This illness of hers waxes and wanes from moment to moment, and the last thing I want is to be away when her fever spikes or a coughing fit assails her. Please, could you help?

dialogue.name: AMANIEU
dialogue.text: You will? Oh, you are a merciful, kind soul! Here, I shall mark on your map where the seeds are like to be found. Giving the containers a thorough once-over should soon yield results.

dialogue.name: AMANIEU
dialogue.text: Though the market is not the only place to find the seeds I need to make kasha, I would recommend inspecting the containers there first before expanding your search.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You are met with a congeries of seeds. Some are too soft, some too hard, but these seem just right.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Alack, there appears to be no sign of the seeds, but you did come across a box of medical supplies.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Would you like to bring these supplies back to the man and his sick daughter?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: There is no sign of any seeds in the area. However, during your search, you stumble upon a stuffed toy bear.

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: Would you like to bring the toy back to Amanieu and his sick daughter?

dialogue.name: AMANIEU
dialogue.text: There you are! And none the worse for wear. Oh, that look on your face─I take it to mean you've found the seeds, then?

dialogue.name: AMANIEU
dialogue.text: You have! How wonderful! This ought to brighten my daughter's spirits─and hopefully entice her to put a bit of food in her belly.

dialogue.name: AMANIEU
dialogue.text: Why, look at all you have brought. Medicine? A toy bear? But I did not even ask, and yet... Goodness, I'm so touched. You are too kind, truly.

dialogue.name: AMANIEU
dialogue.text: My life lately─if one can even call it that─has been consumed by concern. Concern for my daughter's safety, where our next meal will come from... But your good deed today was a bright spot in these bleak times.

dialogue.name: AMANIEU
dialogue.text: What is this? Medical supplies? And it even contains a simple cold remedy. This is too wonderful to be believed!

dialogue.name: AMANIEU
dialogue.text: What have we here? A toy bear? This will do wonders to buoy my daughter's flagging spirits. How considerate you are to think of her so.

dialogue.name: AMANIEU
dialogue.text: To tell the truth, you are not the first to show us unexpected compassion. Being from the provinces, I feared the Garleans here would turn us away, but they offered us food and shelter. If it weren't for them, we may not be alive today.

dialogue.name: AMANIEU
dialogue.text: And now we owe a debt of gratitude to you and your contingent. Thanks to you, my daughter will grow strong again, of this I'm sure. While I can't offer much, I want you to have this. And I will not take no for an answer!
